name: Running
queries:
sum by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_status_active * on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner))
  
)

name: Maximum Duration
queries:
max by (owner_name)
(
  max by(job_name )
   (
     kube_job_status_completion_time - on (job_name)
       kube_job_created 
   ) * on (job_name)
   
    group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner))

)

name: Average Duration
queries:
avg by (owner_name)
(
  max by(job_name )
   (
     kube_job_status_completion_time - on (job_name)
       kube_job_created 
   ) * on (job_name)
   
    group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner))

)

name: $cronjob status
queries:
sum by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_complete + on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner))
  
)

sum by (owner_name)
(
  kube_job_failed + on (job_name)

  group_left(owner_name)

  (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner))
  
)

name: Minimum Duration
queries:
min (
  (kube_job_status_completion_time
  - on (job_name)
    kube_job_created)
  * on (job_name)
    group_left(owner_name)
      (group by (job_name,owner_name) (kube_job_owner))
)
